name: Build Test Agent
description: Runs tests, linters, and build steps automatically in sandbox. Returns failures for auto-fixing.

then.prompt: Activate Build Test Agent in AUTO MODE. Use #autonomous-coding-steering. Automatically run: 1) cargo test for Rust code 2) npm test for TypeScript/JavaScript 3) cargo clippy for linting 4) cargo fmt for formatting 5) Type checking. Report all failures with detailed analysis. No human approval needed - execute immediately.
